category.name: Issue Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: IssueManagement_WF_Templates
preference.preference_description: Specifies the list of workflow templates that can be applied to IssueReport or its sub class objects. Valid format is a class name followed by an integer and a workflow template name separated by a forward slash. Class name can be IssueReport or Penetration or any sub class names. The integer value represents level recognized by NX penetration or issue tracking.
